data.description: Perl implementation of figlet,akin to banner
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
figet is like banner in that it creates asci-art of text in a
    larger size. However figlet supports multiple fonts. Being ascii-art
    pure text I believe it belongs in Text. figlet also fits the whole
    international slant as there are several language fonts.

    Text::FIGlet is pure perl, and a much safer alternative to several
    of the existing CGI interfaces for figlet. It's also cross-platform.
    etc. etc. ;-)
